tool_description: Play sound effects from library to enhance interactions

available_commands.description: Play a sound effect by name with optional volume override

tool_usage_guidance: Use sound effects to punctuate reactions and enhance emotional expression
Available sounds: hello, impostor, jumpscare, squee
Play celebration sounds (squee) for achievements or success
Use jumpscare for surprise or startling moments
Volume range: 0.0 (silent) to 1.0 (full volume), defaults to global volume setting
Sounds play asynchronously and don't block other actions
Use sparingly - sounds should enhance, not overwhelm the experience
proactive_triggers: When reacting with surprise or excitement
When appropriate sound would enhance the emotional context

metadata.notes: Refactored to modern modular tool architecture. Sound files must be .mp3 format.
